results.content: the practical examples are great but I'm still feeling a little confused about some of the fundamentals -  a second and third watch of the videos may clear that up
results.content_html: the practical examples are great but I'm still feeling a little confused about some of the fundamentals - a second and third watch of the videos may clear that up

results.content: I've learnt more in 3 hours from this course than I have in the past 3 months from reading information online. BC's documentation on liquid is very limited in terms of practical examples. I've rated this course 5 stars because not only are there quick and easy examples I have added in to improve customer experience my site, but the code is also explained which has helped me to understand how liquid works and how it can be used to improve functionality. I really hope you guys release more liquid courses!

results.content:
Best Practice, Usable-RE-Usable snippets, code explained, logic explained, Incredibly easy to understand, follow and apply.
New, Intermediate and Experienced take on the lessons.
And yes, a growing list of extremely helpful liquid markup library items to make life easy.  Of course its 5 stars. I wish all tutorials were lifetime, continue growing and this well done

results.content: Great course for the beginner into Liquid. Although some more examples would be great
results.content_html: Great course for the beginner into Liquid. Although some more examples would be great

results.content: The instructors are very well versed on Liquid and Business Catalyst. This course is well done and very informative with step by step instructions and examples that has helped me on my way to a better understanding how to use Liquid Markup in Business Catalyst. I also love the fact that the instructors include some resource code to help me build my Liquid library. Can't wait for more courses to be added.

results.content: Great course to help business catalyst partners get their heads around liquid.  The concept of building a library is super helpful and examples to get started are brilliant.  Thank you!
results.content_html: Great course to help business catalyst partners get their heads around liquid. The concept of building a library is super helpful and examples to get started are brilliant. Thank you!

results.content: Good overview and introduction to Liquid Markup for Adobe Business Catalyst.  The lessons are well thought out and organized.  Includes downloadable code to use.
results.content_html: Good overview and introduction to Liquid Markup for Adobe Business Catalyst. The lessons are well thought out and organized. Includes downloadable code to use.

results.content: Scott and Dave are both great teachers, easy to follow videos using real world examples which are available to download - excellent course!
results.content_html: Scott and Dave are both great teachers, easy to follow videos using real world examples which are available to download - excellent course!
